snippet.title: Gori: Cuddly Carnage | Twitch Integration Trailer
snippet.description:
Gori Cuddly Carnage now has Twitch Integration!
Let your viewers become enemies in game, give you gifts and even bring you back to life! 
For more information on how to set this up - visit https://gori.wtf/twitch-integration/

What is Gori: Cuddly Carnage?

Master explosive weaponry and devastating combos in an epic battle to prevent the Adorable Army from conquering the galaxy, and rescue Professor Y, their missing creator and only human who showed Gori and his friends love. Push your combat and platforming skills to the limits as you fight your way through twisted landscapes filled with environmental hazards, razor-sharp adult humour and a bone-crunching, pulse-pounding soundtrack.

Buy it NOW!:
https://wired.gg/GoriPS
https://wired.gg/GoriXB
https://wired.gg/GoriPC
https://wired.gg/GoriSwitch
https://wired.gg/GoriUtomik
https://wired.gg/GoriEPIC
https://wired.gg/GoriGog

We can't wait to see the mayhem you create and we would love for you to share your uploads, clips and screenshots of Gori: Cuddly Carnage. 

Follow Gori:
Gori: Cuddly Carnage on Twitter: https://x.com/GoriCarnage
Join the Official Discord: https://discord.gg/wiredp
Wishlist on Steam: http://s.team/a/1299690
 
Follow Wired: 
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/WiredP​​
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/WiredPro​​
Discord : https://discord.gg/wiredp​
Instagram : https://www.instagram.com/wired_productions/
Bandcamp: https://wiredproductions.bandcamp.com/follow_me
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@wiredp
